description: Introducing two beauties! Sinnamon Luv, 5'1 tall, 34DD breasts, the smoothest chocolate skin and a very brave demeanor that makes her even more sexy.The Wheel of Misfortune, 10 feet tall, cold steel and submerged in our curve tank... ready to be a challenge to any that dare to take a spin on it.
title: Sinnamon Love and Sgt. Major
